xh:head.xh:title: Appearance of Orbeon Forms Repeated Grids

metadata.title: Appearance of Orbeon Forms Repeated Grids
metadata.description:
This form illustrates the different appearances of repeated grids depending on the following parameters:
 
  1. Repetition over one vs. more rows
  2. Full appearance vs. minimal appearance
  3. Whether to show the repetition number or not
  4. Modifiable vs. readonly grid
  5. Use of HTML tables vs. CSS grids for rendering
With Form Builder, you can control the appearance, numbering, and readonly parameters in the Container Settings dialog. With Orbeon Forms 2022.1, Orbeon Forms uses CSS grids by default. This default can be changed using configuration properties.
